trans-unit.source: Defines a workflow communication activity that is used to call a method on a local service.
This activity is used to send data from the workflow to the host through the local service.

A local service is a class that implements a local service interface (an interface that is marked with <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>) and is added to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService>.
When the external method is called all parameters of the method are cloned.

If the parameter types implement <xref:System.ICloneable> the `Clone` method is called or they are serialized and deserialized with a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
The user-defined name of the activity, used to initialize the activity name property.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken"></xref> for the external method.
This property defines which specific <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> activity a given external method call comes from.
This value can then be used in the payload of a local communication service event to direct that event to the correct <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activity.
[!INCLUDE[crexample](~/includes/crexample-md.md)] correlation, see the [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).
The correlation token for the external method.

Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken"></xref> property.
Tries to run the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> that contains the execution environment in which to run the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity"></xref>.
One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> values.
This <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType"></xref> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
executionContext is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
The service object for the executionContext is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Performs initialization on dependency properties.

This method initializes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.CorrelationToken%2A> property, verifies the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> properties are set and verifies that the event referenced in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> property can be found in the interface referenced in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> property.
Gets or sets an external method's declaring interface that has the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"></xref>.
The external method's declaring interface that has the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute"></xref>.

Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType"></xref> property.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.InterfaceType%2A> property corresponds to the name of the interface that was marked with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.
Occurs before invoking the method.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"></xref> event.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking> event defines an event delegate that is executed before the activity invokes the external method on the local service.
Gets or sets the name of the method to be called on the local service registered with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref>.
The method name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeService"></xref> interface.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName"></xref> property.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodName%2A> property corresponds to the name of a method contained on an interface that is marked with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>.
Provides a hook for derived classes to extract out and return values from the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings"></xref>.
This method is called just after the external method is run.
An <xref href="System.EventArgs"></xref> that contains the data for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"></xref> event.
Provides a hook for derived classes to set <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings"></xref>.
This method is called just before the external method is run.
An <xref href="System.EventArgs"></xref> that contains the data for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.MethodInvoking"></xref> event.
Gets the collection of bindable parameters as found in the external method's formal parameter list.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection"></xref> of parameters to bind to.

Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity.ParameterBindings"></xref> property.
Returns the access type for the specified property.
Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
Without this interface this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.
An object that implements <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
The name of the property.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes"></xref> enumeration value that denotes the access level of the property.
Returns the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the specified property.
Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one other.
An object that implements <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref> to provide access to design time services if they are required.
The name of the property.
The for the property whose name is passed as the propertyName parameter.
